content: yo twice* repeat until last stitch kfb row 12 k2 *drop the two yarn overs of the left needle k1* until one stitch before marker k1 sm p1 sm k1 *drop the two yarn overs of the left needle k1* until last two stitches k2 repeat row 1-12 until desired size see number of repeats of the samples detailed on the previous page repeat row 1-9 one more time bind off using a stretchy bind off and sew in the ends block to shape i blocked my samples aggressively on the width and not very much at all on the height enjoy your cute neckerchief i would love to see your best scout looks please use the hashtag #knittingbadgeneckerchief and tag me on instagram @niklasknits this pattern is for personal use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way nor may you sell any items produced using the instructions in this pattern
